name: tEthereal Network Forensic Console
short_description: Ethereal Network Traffic Session Reconstruction for Internet Protocols. Management Console to reconstruct emails, web sessions, VOIP sessions, FTP, and all known supported Internet Protocols for Network Forensics. ***UPDATE*** Project release scheduled.
